body:
I was running `spack install xsdk` per https://xsdk.info/installing-the-software/ but keep getting stuck on the trilinos download for the last 2 days.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install xsdk
...
==> Installing trilinos
==> Searching for binary cache of trilinos
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for trilinos found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://github.com/trilinos/Trilinos/archive/trilinos-release-12-14-1.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
curl: (18) transfer closed with outstanding read data remaining
==> Fetching from https://github.com/trilinos/Trilinos/archive/trilinos-release-12-14-1.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for trilinos-12.14.1-w2sgkr43iyf4vymnf5z4fcqbax6tqv7z

/home/omsai/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:965, in do_fetch:
        962                raise FetchError("Will not fetch %s" %
        963                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
        964
  >>    965        self.stage.create()
        966        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
        967        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
        968

```

I tried clearing the cache and fetching even ignoring checksum but no dice:

```console
$ spack clean -d trilinos
==> Cleaning build stage [trilinos@12.14.1%gcc@6.3.0~alloptpkgs+amesos+amesos2+anasazi+aztec+belos+boost build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~cgns~complex~debug~dtk+epetra+epetraext+exodus+explicit_template_instantiation~float+fortran~fortrilinos+gtest+hdf5+hypre+ifpack+ifpack2~intrepid~intrepid2~isorropia+kokkos+metis~minitensor+ml+muelu+mumps~nox~openmp~phalanx~piro~pnetcdf~python~rol~rythmos+sacado~shards+shared~shylu~stk+suite-sparse~superlu~superlu-dist~teko~tempus+teuchos+tpetra~x11~xsdkflags~zlib+zoltan+zoltan2 arch=linux-debian9-x86_64/o6p7kp3]
==> Removing cached downloads
```

```console
$ spack fetch trilinos
==> Fetching https://github.com/trilinos/Trilinos/archive/trilinos-release-12-14-1.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
```

### Information on your system
